```{r}
DOI='BVD-523'
GOI='CINP'
```


```{r}
DOI_Broad_id=onTarget$drugCategory$broad_id_trimmed[grep(DOI, onTarget$drugCategory$name)]
DOI_resp=onTarget$secondary_prism[DOI_Broad_id,]
crispr_goi=onTarget$avana_22Q2[GOI,]
commonCellLines=Reduce(intersect, list(names(crispr_goi),
                                       names(DOI_resp),
                                       colnames(onTarget$expression_20Q4)))
crispr_goi=crispr_goi[commonCellLines]
DOI_resp=DOI_resp[commonCellLines]
```
<!-- Standard Correlation -->
```{r}
cor.test(crispr_goi, DOI_resp)
```

```{r}
require(strata)
highExprcommonCellLines=commonCellLines[which(xtile(onTarget$expression_20Q4[GOI,commonCellLines], 10)>7)]
df2plot=data.frame(CRISPR=crispr_goi[highExprcommonCellLines],
           drugTreatment=DOI_resp[highExprcommonCellLines])
Figure4B_data=df2plot
Figure4B_data$drugName=DOI
Figure4B_data$Target='Predicted Target'
Figure4B_data$Targetname=GOI
```

```{r}
Figure4B <- ggplot(Figure4B_data, aes(x=CRISPR, y=drugTreatment))+
  geom_point()+
  stat_smooth(method = 'lm', se = T)+
  facet_wrap(drugName~Target+Targetname, scales = 'free')+
  theme_bw(base_size = 12)+
  labs(x='Viability after CRISPR-KO',
       y=paste('Drug response'))+
  stat_cor(size=4)+
  theme(legend.position = 'top')
```

```{r}
ggsave(Figure4B,
       filename = '/Users/sinhas8/Project_TrueTarget/Results/Figure4B.pdf',
       width = 4, height = 4)
```
